name: Rise Of Time
description:
Synopsis

When the heart of the Tower of the Time is besieged by a temporal anomaly that lets loose an army threatening the stability of the timeline, freezing and seeking to take control of time. It is up to a hero, Aethernus, the Guardian of Time to ensure the balance. A robotic being created and shaped by the sacred blacksmith, the great master of time who has disappeared... The guardian will then have to go through the tower of Time, facing hordes of monsters, while dodging various obstacles. To save the future he will have to go to the top of this tower to understand the cause of these events. The player must then climb the Tower and save the future.

Control

Q and D to move

SPACE to jump

SHIFT + Q or SHIFT + D to dash
